017package org.apache.juneau.bean.atom;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.XmlFormat.*;
021
022import java.net.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.*;
027
028/**
029 * Represents a larger logo image for visual identification of a feed.
030 *
031 * <p>
032 * The logo element contains a URI reference to an image that provides visual identification
033 * for the feed. Logos are typically larger than icons and are suitable for display in feed
034 * readers, aggregators, and feed directories.
035 *
036 * <p>
037 * Per RFC 4287 recommendations:
038 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
039 *    <li>Should have a 2:1 aspect ratio (twice as wide as tall)
040 *    <li>Common formats: PNG, JPEG, GIF, SVG
041 *    <li>Suitable for prominent display in feed readers
042 * </ul>
043 *
044 * <h5 class='figure'>Schema</h5>
045 * <p class='bschema'>
046 *    atomLogo = element atom:logo {
047 *       atomCommonAttributes,
048 *       (atomUri)
049 *    }
050 * </p>
051 *
052 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
053 * <p class='bjava'>
054 *    Logo <jv>logo</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Logo(<js>"http://example.org/logo.png"</js>);
055 *
056 *    Feed <jv>feed</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Feed(...)
057 *       .setLogo(<jv>logo</jv>);
058 * </p>
059 *
060 * <h5 class='section'>Specification:</h5>
061 * <p>
062 * Represents an <c>atomLogo</c> construct in the
063 * <a class="doclink" href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4287#section-4.2.8">RFC 4287 - Section 4.2.8</a> specification.
064 *
065 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
066 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanAtom">juneau-bean-atom</a>
067 *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4287">RFC 4287 - The Atom Syndication Format</a>
068 * </ul>
069 */
070@Bean(typeName="logo")
071public class Logo extends Common {
072
073   private URI uri;
074
075   /**
076    * Normal constructor.
077    *
078    * <p>
079    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
080    * <br>Strings must be valid URIs.
081    *
082    * <p>
083    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
084    *
085    * @param uri The URI of the logo.
086    */
087   public Logo(Object uri) {
088      setUri(uri);
089   }
090
091   /** Bean constructor. */
092   public Logo() {}
093
094   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
095   // Bean properties
096   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
097
098   /**
099    * Bean property getter:  <property>uri</property>.
100    *
101    * <p>
102    * The URI of the logo.
103    *
104    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
105    */
106   @Xml(format=TEXT)
107   public URI getUri() {
108      return uri;
109   }
110
111   /**
112    * Bean property setter:  <property>uri</property>.
113    *
114    * <p>
115    * The URI of the logo.
116    *
117    * <p>
118    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
119    * <br>Strings must be valid URIs.
120    *
121    * <p>
122    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
123    *
124    * @param value
125    *    The new value for this property.
126    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
127    * @return This object
128    */
129   public Logo setUri(Object value) {
130      this.uri = toURI(value);
131      return this;
132   }
133
134   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
135   // Overridden setters (to simplify method chaining)
136   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
137
138   @Override /* Overridden from Common */
139   public Logo setBase(Object value) {
140      super.setBase(value);
141      return this;
142   }
143
144   @Override /* Overridden from Common */
145   public Logo setLang(String value) {
146      super.setLang(value);
147      return this;
148   }
149}
